headline: Ohio officer killed trying to stop fleeing car on highway
author: The Associated Press
sentences: "In honor of the life and legacy of Bluffton Police Officer Dominic Francis, Governor DeWine has ordered that flags of the United States and the State of Ohio be flown at half-staff upon all public buildings and grounds throughout Allen and Hancock counties, the Ohio Statehouse, the Vern Rife Center and the Rhodes State Officer Tower.
